TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GlyphRun extends System.Object implements class System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize

summary.span: 表示一序列标志符号，这些标志符号来自具有一种字号和一种呈现样式的一种字体。

span.span: Represents a sequence of glyphs from a single face of a single font at a single size, and with a single rendering style.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象包括字体标志符号索引和各个标志符号位置等的详细信息。The object includes font details such as glyph indices and individual glyph positions. 此外，对象包含从中生成运行的原始 Unicode 码位，字符标志符号缓冲区偏移量映射信息，以及每个字符和每个标志符号的标志。In addition, The object contains the original Unicode code points the run was generated from, character to glyph buffer offset mapping information, and per-character and per-glyph flags. 元素表示的输出在 XAML 中。The element represents the output of a in XAML. 以下的标记语法用于描述元素。The following markup syntax is used to describe the element. [!code-xaml[GlyphsOvwSample1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GlyphsOvwSample1/CS/default.xaml#1)] 每个字形定义度量值，指定与其他的对齐方式。Each glyph defines metrics that specify how it aligns with other . 以下图形定义两种不同字形字符的各种排版品质。The following graphic defines the various typographic qualities of two different glyph characters. ![标志符号度量示意图](~/add/media/glyph-example.png "标志符号度量示意图")![Diagraph of glyph measurements](~/add/media/glyph-example.png "Diagraph of glyph measurements") 两个不同的标志符号字符的各种版式质量Various typographic qualities of two different glyph characters

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(float32 pixelsPerDip) cil managed

param.name: pixelsPerDip
param.span: 按“密度无关像素”单位计算的像素值，等效于比例因子。

span.span: The Pixels Per Density Independent Pixel value, which is the equivalent of the scale factor.

param.span: 例如，如果屏幕的 DPI 为 120（或 1.25，因为 120/96 = 1.25），那么“密度无关像素”值为 1.25。

span.span: For example, if the DPI of a screen is 120 (or 1.25 because 120/96 = 1.25) , 1.25 pixel per density independent pixel is drawn.

param.span: DPI 是 WPF 采用的独立于设备分辨率和 DPI 的度量单位。

span.span: DIP is the unit of measurement used by WPF to be independent of device resolution and DPIs.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property AdvanceWidths As IList(Of Double)
public: property System::Collections::Generic::IList<double> ^ AdvanceWidths { System::Collections::Generic::IList<double> ^ get(); void set(System::Collections::Generic::IList<double> ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 值的列表，这些值表示对应于字形索引的步进宽度。

span.span: Gets or sets the list of values that represent the advance widths corresponding to the glyph indices.

value.span: 表示步进宽度的 值列表。

span.span: A list of values that represent the advance widths.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个列表中的前进宽度的项对应于返回的标志符号值属性。Each item in the list of advance widths corresponds to the glyph values returned by the property. N 的名义原点th运行中的标志符号 (n > 0) n-1 的名义原点是th标志符号加上 n-1th步进沿运行步进向量增加的宽度。The nominal origin of the nth glyph in the run (n>0) is the nominal origin of the n-1th glyph plus the n-1th advance width added along the runs advance vector. 基标志符号通常有一个非零的步进宽度，而合并的标志符号通常具有零步进宽度。Base glyphs generally have a non-zero advance width, whereas combining glyphs generally have a zero advance width.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回包含中的所有标志符号的组合的几何图形。The returned contains the combined geometry of all glyphs in the . 通过执行 boolean 类型的值的联合操作合并重叠的轮廓线。Overlapping contours are merged by performing a Boolean union operation.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property ClusterMap As IList(Of UShort)

public: property System::Collections::Generic::IList<System::UInt16> ^ ClusterMap { System::Collections::Generic::IList<System::UInt16> ^ get(); void set(System::Collections::Generic::IList<System::UInt16> ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置将 中的字符映射到字形索引的 值列表。

span.span: Gets or sets the list of values that maps characters in the to glyph indices.

value.span: 表示映射的字形索引的 值列表。

span.span: A list of values that represent mapped glyph indices.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 没有每个列表中的字符的一个条目。There is one entry per character in the list. 在列表中的每个值提供的第一个字形对齐，由表示的偏移量，由表示的相应字符。Each value in the list gives the offset of the first glyph, represented by , to the corresponding character, represented by . 其中的多个字符将映射到单个标志符号，或不能为细分为映射完全到单独字符的标志符号组，所有字符的项具有相同的值： 表示此组的字符的第一个标志符号的偏移量。Where multiple characters map to a single glyph, or to a glyph group that cannot be broken down to map exactly to individual characters, the entries for all the characters have the same value: the offset of the first glyph that represents this group of characters. 如果列表为`null`于或等于，假定顺序 1 对 1 映射。If the list is `null` or equal to , sequential 1 to 1 mapping is assumed.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DeviceFontName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置已优化其 的特定设备字体。

span.span: Gets or sets the specific device font for which the has been optimized.

value.span: 一个表示设备字体的 值。

span.span: A value that represents the device font.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当已命名的设备字体的内置支持的设备上呈现应使用设备特定机制，用于选择该字体，并发送 Unicode 码位，而不是标志符号索引呈现。When a is rendered on a device that has built-in support for the named device font, the should be rendered using a device specific mechanism for selecting that font, and by sending Unicode code points rather than glyph indices. 在呈现的设备上不包括命名的设备字体的内置支持时应忽略。When rendering onto a device that does not include built-in support for the named device font, should be ignored.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit GetCaretCharacterHitFromDistance (double distance, out bool isInside);
.method public hidebysig instance valuetype System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit GetCaretCharacterHitFromDistance(float64 distance, [out] bool& isInside) cil managed
Public Function GetCaretCharacterHitFromDistance (distance As Double, ByRef isInside As Boolean) As CharacterHit

param.name: distance
param.span: 用于计算插入符号字符命中的偏移量。

span.span: Offset to use for computing the caret character hit.

param.name: isInside
param.span: 确定字符命中是否在 中。

span.span: Determines whether the character hit is inside the .

summary.span: 检索 值，该值表示 的插入符号的字符命中。

span.span: Retrieves the value that represents the character hit of the caret of the .

returns.span: 一个 值，表示与 值最接近的字符命中。

span.span: A value that represents the character hit that is closest to the value.

returns.span: 如果字符命中在 内，则输出参数 返回 ；否则返回 。

span.span: The out parameter returns if the character hit is inside the ; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `distance`值表示从前导边缘的偏移量。The `distance` value represents the offset from the leading edge of the . 如果命中之外，则，字符命中表示命中中的最接近的插入符号字符。If the hit is outside the , the character hit represents the closest caret character hit within the . 结构表示关于命中中字符的信息-已命中，以及有关前导或尾随边缘的信息的第一个字符的索引。The structure represents information about a character hit within a —the index of the first character that was hit as well as information about the leading or trailing edge.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance float64 GetDistanceFromCaretCharacterHit(valuetype System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit characterHit) cil managed

span.span: The to use for computing the offset.

summary.span: 检索 的前导边缘相对于脱字符（包含指定的字符命中）的前导边缘或尾随边缘的偏移量。

span.span: Retrieves the offset from the leading edge of the to the leading or trailing edge of a caret stop containing the specified character hit.

returns.span: 一个 ，表示 的前导边缘相对于脱字符（包含字符命中）的前导或尾随边缘的偏移量。

span.span: A that represents the offset from the leading edge of the to the leading or trailing edge of a caret stop containing the character hit.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果则不会命中 0.0 的距离返回的可测试性。If the is not hit testable, the distance of 0.0 is returned. 使用属性来确定如果可以命中测试。Use the property to determine if a can be hit test.

exception.span: 字符命中在由 Unicode 字符串指定的范围外部。

span.span: The character hit is outside the range specified by the Unicode string.

public: property System::Collections::Generic::IList<System::UInt16> ^ GlyphIndices { System::Collections::Generic::IList<System::UInt16> ^ get(); void set(System::Collections::Generic::IList<System::UInt16> ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 值的数组，这些值表示采用呈现物理字体的标志符号索引。

span.span: Gets or sets an array of values that represent the glyph indices in the rendering physical font.

value.span: 一个 值列表，这些值表示标志符号索引。

span.span: A list of values that represent the glyph indices.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认值的标志符号索引定义由内部文本中的相应的 Unicode 码位的字体的字符映射表。The default value of the glyph indices are defined by the font's character map table for the corresponding Unicode code points in the inner text.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property GlyphOffsets As IList(Of Point)

public: property System::Collections::Generic::IList<System::Windows::Point> ^ GlyphOffsets { System::Collections::Generic::IList<System::Windows::Point> ^ get(); void set(System::Collections::Generic::IList<System::Windows::Point> ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 值的数组，这些值表示 中字形的偏移量。

span.span: Gets or sets an array of values representing the offsets of the glyphs in the .

value.span: 表示字形偏移量的 值列表。

span.span: A list of values representing the offsets of glyph.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 标志符号偏移量的值添加到名义标志符号 origin，以便生成最终原点的标志符号。The glyph offset values are added to the nominal glyph origin to generate the final origin for the glyph. 属性表示的值的名义标志符号来源。The property represents the values of the nominal glyph origins for the . 基标志符号通常具有标志符号偏移量 （0，0），合并的标志符号通常有顶端前面最近正确放置的偏移量基标志符号。Base glyphs generally have a glyph offset of (0, 0), combining glyphs generally have an offset that places them correctly on top of the nearest preceding base glyph.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsSideways { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否旋转标志字符。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to rotate glyphs.

value.span: 如果可以旋转该标志字符，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the glyphs are rotated; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果是`true`，构成文本字符的标志符号是逆时针旋转，使用垂直基线定位度量值方向旋转 90 °。If is `true`, the glyphs that make up text characters are rotated 90° counter-clockwise, using vertical baseline positioning metrics.
